posts.post_text: February 24, 2016 at 1:38 PM#2Setup -> Show tab -> Playback & MIB Timing.You can also always temporarily use custom timing by saying [color=#66FF00]Go- Fade[/color] x, and then tapping an exec button. Note that you'd be pressing the Go- in your programming section, NOT the big Go- button below the 100mm faders. Also, Fade is inserted via the [Time] key.
